mapper.update:
update TOM_ROLLING_PICTURE
RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PICTURE_CATEGORY = #{pictureCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICTURE_URL = #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PICTURE_URL_EN = #{pictureUrlEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VIEW_COUNT = #{viewCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_RELEASE = #{isRelease,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMINS = #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RESOURCE_NAME= #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_ROLLING_ALL_EMP = #{isRollingAllEmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where PICTURE_ID = #{pictureId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TOM_ROLLING_PICTURE set RESOURCE_ID = #{resourceId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PICTURE_CATEGORY = #{pictureCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTURE_URL = #{pictureUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICTURE_URL_EN = #{pictureUrlEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VIEW_COUNT = #{viewCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IS_RELEASE = #{isRelease,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMINS = #{admins,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PICTURE_ID = #{pictureId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update TOM_ROLLING_PICTURE
RELEASE_TIME = #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IS_RELEASE = #{isRelease,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_TOP = #{isTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELEASER = #{releaser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PICTURE_ID = #{pictureId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
from TOM_ROLLING_PICTURE where IS_RELEASE='Y' and DELETED='Y' order by IS_TOP desc,RELEASE_TIME desc
limit 0,5

SELECT a.* FROM `tom_rolling_picture` a ,`tom_rolling_picture_emp` b WHERE a.`PICTURE_ID` = b.`PICTURE_ID` AND a.IS_RELEASE='Y' AND a.DELETED='Y' AND b.`EMP_ID` = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.IS_TOP DESC,a.RELEASE_TIME DESC
SELECT a.* FROM `tom_rolling_picture` a WHERE a.`IS_ROLLING_ALL_EMP` = 'Y' AND a.deleted='Y' AND a.IS_RELEASE='Y' ORDER BY a.IS_TOP DESC,a.RELEASE_TIME DESC
